lyric:
[00:00.300]If you've been just staring at the sunrise above this hollow town
[00:06.170]been chasing empty memories, the kind that's keeping you down
[00:11.650]can't seem to find your strife, just trying to live your life
[00:16.430]been feeling suffocated, searching for vindication
[00:21.050]
[00:21.450]this sense of indecision ain't what we had in mind
[00:26.350]the dream that I envisioned, I am still hoping to find
[00:31.640]you ain't done nothing wrong but we ain't done nothing right
[00:36.420]I know that something's missing
[00:39.050]
[00:39.350]but the world will keep on turning turning
[00:43.890]you gotta keep that fire burning burning
[00:48.910]I know you think you're in a hurry
[00:52.350]there's no need to worry
[00:54.610]cause I can feel it turning turning
[00:58.820]our luck is turning around
[01:01.220]
[01:01.680]chasing these empty verses, some rows have crooked signs
[01:06.440]we're losing all this daylight but soon the moon's gonna rise
[01:11.590]these final puzzle pieces, we tried but they're too tight
[01:16.280]but if we ease the pressure, I bet they'll fit just right
[01:21.390]
[01:21.510]sometimes it takes some patience, sometimes it works first try
[01:26.590]but I know that this is worth it, cause this dream's too strong to die
[01:31.650]I ain't done nothing wrong but we ain't done nothing right
[01:36.430]one day we'll find what's missing
[01:39.100]
[01:39.220]but the world will keep on turning turning
[01:43.860]you gotta keep that fire burning burning
[01:48.810]I know you think you're in a hurry
[01:52.270]there's no need to worry
[01:54.360]cause I can feel it turning turning
[01:58.950]our luck is turning around
[02:04.130]
[02:11.930]I've been in, I've been out
[02:14.270]I've been low, beaten down
[02:16.680]I've been lost now I'm found
[02:19.090]this fire is burning us
[02:21.660]still staring at the sunrise, missing that hollow town
[02:26.440]feeling those empty memories but nothing's holding me down
[02:31.570]I hope you find your strife, just go and live your life
[02:36.420]I'm feeling vindicated
[02:39.560]the world will keep on turning turning
[02:44.250]you better keep that fire burning burning
[02:49.310]I know you think you're in a hurry
[02:52.420]there's no need to worry
[02:54.830]cause I can feel it turning turning
[02:59.360]our luck is turning around (turning turning)
[03:04.140]our luck is turning around (turning turning)
[03:09.270]our luck is turning around (turning turning)
[03:11.710]I've been in, I've been out
[03:14.210]I've been low, beaten down
[03:16.720]I've been lost now I'm found
[03:19.200]our luck is turning around
tlyric:
[00:00.300]如若你时常凝望这空城之上，静待旭日东升
[00:06.170]又终日追随着虚无的回忆，浪费光阴也只会让你止步不前
[00:11.650]既然挑无自己的违和之处，那只管好好生活便是
[00:16.430]也曾苟延残喘，只得寻觅一份辩护之书
[00:21.050]
[00:21.450]这种优柔寡断，才不该在你我脑海中扎营
[00:26.350]那个我心心念念的梦啊，如今我仍想把它找到
[00:31.640]你并非毫无过错，但我们也绝非一事无成
[00:36.420]我明白，有些东西早已被我错过
[00:39.050]
[00:39.350]但地球只是照旧在转、转、转
[00:43.890]你势必让心火继续燃、燃、燃
[00:48.910]我知，你总觉着自己如今正是栖栖遑遑
[00:52.350]其实本就毋须慌乱
[00:54.610]我有预感，剧情正在反转
[00:58.820]好运终将归来
[01:01.220]
[01:01.680]跟着这首歌的节奏吧，虽然总有几行看着不太美好
[01:06.440]纵是日落西山，光芒散尽，但一轮新月正冉冉高升
[01:11.590]这最终谜题（原意指最后几片拼图碎片）便是，你我早已全力以赴，却还是逃不开它们的紧追不舍
[01:16.280]不过你我若是能享受这重压，我断言这些定会契合完美
[01:21.390]
[01:21.510]有时总需几分耐心，有时又需几分勇气
[01:26.590]可我懂得，一切都不会毫无意义，毕竟生命不息，梦想不死
[01:31.650]我也并非毫无过错，但我们也绝非一事无成
[01:36.430]终有一天，我们会弥补缺憾
[01:39.100]
[01:39.220]但地球只是照旧在转、转、转
[01:43.860]你势必让心火继续燃、燃、燃
[01:48.810]我知，你总觉着自己如今正是栖栖遑遑
[01:52.270]其实本就毋须慌乱
[01:54.360]我有预感，剧情正在反转
[01:58.950]好运终将归来
[02:04.130]
[02:11.930]我曾入世，亦曾出世
[02:14.270]我曾被击倒，身居谷底
[02:16.680]我曾失掉自我，可如今我已找回
[02:19.090]这星火，燃起你我心火
[02:21.660]仍旧凝望着朝阳缓升，只是空城不再
[02:26.440]还是舍不去过往回忆，可已心无羁绊
[02:31.570]愿你坎坷之时，仍旧前行，仍旧好好生活
[02:36.420]你我并无罪过

[02:39.560]但地球只是照旧在转、转、转
[02:44.250]心火绝不可熄
[02:49.310]我懂，你时常碌碌终日而无所得
[02:52.420]可是你也别自乱阵脚
[02:54.830]我能确定，命数自有天定

[02:59.360]我们终将时来运转
[03:04.140]我们终将时来运转
[03:09.270]我们终将时来运转

[03:11.710]我曾入世，亦曾出世
[03:14.210]我曾入世，亦曾出世
[03:16.720]我曾被击倒，身居谷底
[03:19.200]我曾失掉自我，可如今我已找回
